metadata.title: CVE-2021-38385 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Tor before 0.3.5.16, 0.4.5.10, and 0.4.6.7 mishandles the relationship between batch-signature verification and single-signature verification, leading to a remote assertion failure, aka TROVE-2021-007.

criterions.comment: tor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
